video.title: Black Books
video.synopsis: A misanthropic bookshop owner named Bernard Black wakes up from a bender to discover, to his horror, that he's hired cheery Manny Bianco as a clerk.

episodes.synopsis: When his dodgy accountant goes on the run, Bernard finds himself having to fill out his own tax return.
episodes.title: Cooking the Books

episodes.synopsis: Manny has to navigate the twin perils of a strange boss and an equally strange clientele when he comes to work at Bernard's bookshop.
episodes.title: Manny's First Day

episodes.synopsis: The discomforting presence of an oddly sensual cleaner in the book shop forces Bernard and Manny to accept a house-sitting job.
episodes.title: The Grapes of Wrath

episodes.synopsis: Manny, hyper after a night of drinking too many espressos, is mistaken for a policeman after his high-speed pursuit of a bag snatcher.
episodes.title: The Blackout

episodes.synopsis: The installation of a new security system for the shop that neither Bernard nor Manny can operate results in Bernard being locked out for the evening.
episodes.title: The Big Lock-Out

episodes.synopsis: Manny becomes a runaway when Bernard's relentless bossiness gets to be too much for him.
episodes.title: He's Leaving Home

episodes.synopsis: Ever keen to distract herself, Fran takes up piano. Ever keen to delude himself, Bernard falls in love. All Manny wants is a break.
episodes.title: The Entertainer

episodes.synopsis: Fran can't sleep in the heat. Bernard needs a girlfriend to stop him staring. And Manny can't say what will happen if it gets to 88 degrees.
episodes.title: Fever

episodes.synopsis: Manny uses his underworld connections to find Fran mysterious employment. In return, all Manny and Bernard have to do is educate a psychopath.
episodes.title: The Fixer

episodes.synopsis: Unemployed and restless, Fran takes comfort in the discovery of her exotic cousins. Manny and Bernard turn the infested bookshop into a restaurant.
episodes.title: Blood

episodes.synopsis: Fran tries to discover her inner karma at the advice of her disapproving friend Eva. Bernard finds proof positive that Manny is mad.
episodes.title: Hello Sun

episodes.synopsis: Bernard and Manny can't hear themselves argue because of the builders next door. Fran suggests a holiday. But how will the trio fare abroad together?
episodes.title: A Nice Change

episodes.synopsis: Fran returns from holiday to find Manny's resigned and is now working at Goliath Books. Left to his own devices, Bernard has let things slip a little.
episodes.title: Manny Come Home

episodes.synopsis: It's International Children's Book week in Black Books, and Bernard and Manny decide to write their own kids' classic so they can retire Rowling-rich.
episodes.title: Elephants and Hens

episodes.synopsis: Manny's parents come to stay. Bernard wants them gone. Fran is grumpy about pretending to be Manny's girlfriend to corroborate his letters home.
episodes.title: Moo-Ma and Moo-Pa

episodes.synopsis: Manny puts a bet on the Grand National for Bernard, who claims not to be interested in gambling but immediately becomes completely addicted to it.
episodes.title: A Little Flutter

episodes.synopsis: Manny's organized a travel writing festival and invited the famously charming explorer Jason Hamilton to give a talk. Fran soon falls for Jason.
episodes.title: Travel Writer

episodes.synopsis: It's Friday night. Manny and Fran are determined to go out and do something for once. Bernard would rather stay home, get drunk and ignore his pals.
episodes.title: Party
